attributes.action: MP's who fiddle their expenses should not be given honours
attributes.additional_details: See The Evening Standard, the Daily Mirror, the Guardian, and the Daily Mail websites - Expenses Scandal MP Douglas Hogg becomes a Lord
attributes.background: Expenses Scandal MP Douglas Hogg expected the UK taxpayers to pay for the cleaning of his Moat on his Country Estate - this week he was made a Lord. This should not be allowed.
